chunk: PCI DSS 4_0_1 Requirement Control 8.1.1 Defined Approach Requirements: All security policies and operational procedures that are identified in Requirement 8 are: Documented. Kept up to date. In use. Known to all affected parties. Customized Approach Objective: Expectations, controls, and oversight for meeting activities within Requirement 8 are defined and adhered to by affected personnel. All supporting activities are repeatable, consistently applied, and conform to management’s intent.
